class.name: ProjectNotifier
class.description: Configures one method for notifying users/developers when a build breaks.

field.name: type
field.description: The mechanism used to deliver notifications.

field.name: type
field.description: The mechanism used to deliver notifications.

field.name: from
field.description: The origin of the notifier (pom or user).

field.name: configuration
field.description: Extended configuration specific to this notifier goes here.

class.name: BuildResult
class.description: This class is a single continuum build.

field.name: buildFresh
field.description: true if the build is to be smoked and checked back out from the scm each build

field.name: description
field.description: description of the buid defintion

field.name: type
field.description: type of the buid defintion

field.name: alwaysBuild
field.description: true if the build had to be forced even if there is no scm change

field.name: template
field.description: true if this buildDefinition is a template

field.name: continuumDefault
field.description: true if this definition is a continuum default build def (cannot be removed)

field.name: type
field.description: type of the buid BuildDefinitionTemplate use for default

field.name: delay
field.description: Delay in seconds.

field.name: delay
field.description: Delay in seconds.

field.name: maxJobExecutionTime
field.description: Maximum execution time of a job in seconds before it's terminated.

class.name: NotificationAddress
class.description: Configures one method for notifying users/developers when a build breaks.

field.name: type
field.description: The mechanism used to deliver notifications.

field.name: type
field.description: The mechanism used to deliver notifications.

field.name: configuration
field.description: Extended configuration specific to this notifier goes here.

field.name: location
field.description: The file system location for this repository

field.name: layout
field.description: The layout of the repository. Valid values are "default" and "legacy"

field.name: retentionCount
field.description: The total count of the artifact for each snapshot or the release/build output folder to be retained.

field.name: daysOlder
field.description: The number of days old which will be the basis for removing a snapshot or a folder.

field.name: deleteReleasedSnapshots
field.description: True if the released snapshots are to be removed from the repo during repository purge.

field.name: location
field.description: The file system path for this directory

field.name: directoryType
field.description: The type of directory. Valid values are "releases" and "buildOutput"

field.name: buildAgentUrl
field.description: BuildAgent URL

field.name: directoryType
field.description: The type of directory. Valid values are "releases" and "working"
